Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava class declaration.

A class declaration is represented by:

  • a string representing the class name
  • a list of class members, that is fields and methods, represented by FieldDeclaration and MethodDeclaration nodes, respectively.

Parameters:

void ClassDeclaration::addMember ( Declaration *  member  ) 

Add a new class mamber (either a field or a method).

Parameters:
member a Declaration node representing the new class member. It must be either a pointer to FieldDeclaration or to MethodDeclaration.
Exceptions:
AstException if the argument is neither a FieldDeclaration nor a MethodDeclaration.
Declaration* ClassDeclaration::getMember ( int  pos  )  [inline]

Return the i-the class member.

Parameters:

Returns:
a pointer to a Declaration representing the requested class member.
Exceptions:
AstException if there are no members or if the pos value is out of bounds
